title: 31F doctor raped and murdered in the hospital she worked at
selftext: My heart goes out to the family who has to loose a daughter to this barbarity. Imagine feeling safe and sound at your workplace, while the monsters lurking behind you.
comments: Might be done by some tmc goon . I don't know why we keep on voting for them . Their is not a single honest candidate in a single party . Bjp , cpim , tmc all are same .
